На 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}раунд{/g} колдун наделяет существо случайным даром Тзинча: Силой перемен, Варп-туманом или Голосом повелителя.

languages.text: 随机赐予目标生物一项奸奇赐福：{g|f:fc06fceaaef2475f9592f467cde3babb}诡变之力{/g}、{g|f:37c298e6b4fa47d7986d8b1abc6b9415}亚空间迷雾{/g}或{g|f:6a1602ed36a04f678548ac81d6dd02a6}真理之声{/g}，持续一{g|Encyclopedia:Round}轮{/g}。

traits.locale_text: 随机赐予目标生物一项奸奇赐福：诡变之力、亚空间迷雾或真理之声，持续一{g|Encyclopedia:Round}轮{/g}。

languages.text: 1{g|Encyclopedia:Round}ラウンド{/g}ごとに、ソーサラーは生物に次のティーンチギフトの1つをランダムに与える。変化の力、<歪み>のミスト、主の声。
languages.original_text: For 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}, the sorcerer randomly grants a creature one of the Tzeentch's gifts: Might of Change, Warp Mist, or Voice of the Lord.

traits.locale_text: 1{g|Encyclopedia:Round}ラウンド{/g}ごとに、ソーサラーは生物に次のティーンチギフトの1つをランダムに与える。変化の力、<歪み>のミスト、主の声。

languages.text: Durante 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}asalto{/g}, el hechicero proporciona a una criatura uno de los dones de Tzeentch: {g|f:fc06fceaaef2475f9592f467cde3babb}Poder del cambio{/g}, {g|f:37c298e6b4fa47d7986d8b1abc6b9415}Niebla de disformidad{/g} o {g|f:6a1602ed36a04f678548ac81d6dd02a6}Voz del amo{/g}.
languages.original_text: For 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}, the sorcerer randomly grants a creature one of the Tzeentch's gifts: {g|f:fc06fceaaef2475f9592f467cde3babb}Might of Change{/g}, {g|f:37c298e6b4fa47d7986d8b1abc6b9415}Warp Mist{/g}, or {g|f:6a1602ed36a04f678548ac81d6dd02a6}Voice of the Lord{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Durante 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}asalto{/g}, el hechicero proporciona a una criatura uno de los dones de Tzeentch: Poder del cambio, Niebla de disformidad o Voz del amo.

languages.text: 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}Runde{/g} lang gewährt der Magier einer Kreatur zufällig eine von Tzeentchs Gaben: {g|f:fc06fceaaef2475f9592f467cde3babb}Macht des Wandels{/g}, {g|f:37c298e6b4fa47d7986d8b1abc6b9415}Warpnebel{/g}, oder {g|f:6a1602ed36a04f678548ac81d6dd02a6}Stimme des Herrn{/g}.
languages.original_text: For 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}, the sorcerer randomly grants a creature one of the Tzeentch's gifts: {g|f:fc06fceaaef2475f9592f467cde3babb}Might of Change{/g}, {g|f:37c298e6b4fa47d7986d8b1abc6b9415}Warp Mist{/g}, or {g|f:6a1602ed36a04f678548ac81d6dd02a6}Voice of the Lord{/g}.

traits.locale_text: 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}Runde{/g} lang gewährt der Magier einer Kreatur zufällig eine von Tzeentchs Gaben: Macht des Wandels, Warpnebel, oder Stimme des Herrn.

languages.text: Pendant 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}, le sorcier confère aléatoirement à une créature l'une des faveurs de Tzeentch suivantes : {g|f:fc06fceaaef2475f9592f467cde3babb}Pouvoir du changement{/g}, {g|f:37c298e6b4fa47d7986d8b1abc6b9415}Brume du Warp{/g} ou {g|f:6a1602ed36a04f678548ac81d6dd02a6}Voix du seigneur{/g}..
languages.original_text: For 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}, the sorcerer randomly grants a creature one of the Tzeentch's gifts: {g|f:fc06fceaaef2475f9592f467cde3babb}Might of Change{/g}, {g|f:37c298e6b4fa47d7986d8b1abc6b9415}Warp Mist{/g}, or {g|f:6a1602ed36a04f678548ac81d6dd02a6}Voice of the Lord{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Pendant 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}, le sorcier confère aléatoirement à une créature l'un des dons de Tzeentch suivants : Pouvoir du Changement, Brume du Warp ou Voix du Seigneur.

languages.text: Sahir, bir yaratığa rastgele Tzeentch'in armağanlarından birini ({g|f:fc06fceaaef2475f9592f467cde3babb}Değişimin Gücü{/g}, {g|f:37c298e6b4fa47d7986d8b1abc6b9415}Öte Sisi{/g} veya {g|f:6a1602ed36a04f678548ac81d6dd02a6}Efendinin Sesi{/g}) kazandırır. Etkisi 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}raunt{/g} sürer.
languages.original_text: For 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}, the sorcerer randomly grants a creature one of the Tzeentch's gifts: {g|f:fc06fceaaef2475f9592f467cde3babb}Might of Change{/g}, {g|f:37c298e6b4fa47d7986d8b1abc6b9415}Warp Mist{/g}, or {g|f:6a1602ed36a04f678548ac81d6dd02a6}Voice of the Lord{/g}.
